name: HubWorld
description:
HubWorld is a relaxing first-person exploration game with a focus on visual design, novelty, and ease of use.

The player uses standard [WASD] controls to explore the game’s levels while moving the mouse to look around in first person. To load the next level simply click the left mouse button.

Levels:

[ Island ]

[ Forest ]

[ World ]

[ Sky ]

Download the soundtrack @ https://jeremyulrich.bandcamp.com/
